name: NSColorSpace
desc: An object that represents a custom color space.

items.name: class var deviceRGB: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a calibrated or device-dependent RGB color space.

items.name: class var genericRGB: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a device-independent RGB color space.

items.name: class var deviceCMYK: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a calibrated or device-dependent CMYK color space.

items.name: class var genericCMYK: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a device-independent CMYK color space.

items.name: class var deviceGray: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a calibrated or device-dependent gray color space.

items.name: class var genericGray: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a device-independent gray color space.

items.name: class var sRGB: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents an sRGB color space.

items.name: class var extendedSRGB: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents an extended sRGB color space.

items.name: class var displayP3: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a P3 Display color space.

items.name: class var genericGamma22Gray: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents a gray color space with a gamma value of 2.2.

items.name: class var extendedGenericGamma22Gray: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents an extended gray color space with a gamma value of 2.2.

items.name: class var adobeRGB1998: NSColorSpace
items.desc: A color space object that represents an Adobe RGB (1998) color space.

items.name: class func availableColorSpaces(with: NSColorSpace.Model) -> [NSColorSpace]
items.desc: Returns the list of color spaces available on the system that are displayed in the color panel, in the order they are displayed in the color panel.

items.name: init?(cgColorSpace: CGColorSpace)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a color space object initialized from a Core Graphics color-space object.

items.name: init?(colorSyncProfile: UnsafeMutableRawPointer)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a color space object from the specified ColorSync profile.

items.name: init?(iccProfileData: Data)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a color space object from the specified ICC profile.

items.name: var cgColorSpace: CGColorSpace?
items.desc: The Core Graphics color-space object that represents a color space equivalent to the color spaceâ€™s.

items.name: var colorSpaceModel: NSColorSpace.Model
items.desc: The model on which the color space is based.

items.name: enum NSColorSpace.Model
items.desc: Constants that describe the abstract model on which color space objects are based.

items.name: var colorSyncProfile: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: The ColorSync profile from which the color space was created.

items.name: var iccProfileData: Data?
items.desc: The ICC profile data from which the color space was created.

items.name: var localizedName: String?
items.desc: The localized name of the color space.

items.name: var numberOfColorComponents: Int
items.desc: The number of components, excluding alpha, the color space supports.
